## AlSubscriptionGroup.manage() method

Adds one or more subscriptions (as themselves, in arrays, via callback function, or some mixture of these inputs) to the internal list of managed items.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
manage(...items: any[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  items | <code>any[]</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
